title: OPPO opens up ColorOS 12 beta program for OPPO F19, F17, A73, and A53 as Reno 4 Z 5G gets the stable update
content:
Earlier this month, OPPO detailed which OPPO phones were scheduled to get the ColorOS 12 update based on Android 12 in April. As promised, the company has opened up the ColorOS 12 beta program for several new smartphones. ColorOS 12 beta OPPO is inviting owners of OPPO F19, F17, A73, and A53 to try out

The post OPPO opens up ColorOS 12 beta program for OPPO F19, F17, A73, and A53 as Reno 4 Z 5G gets the stable update appeared first on xda-developers.
description: OPPO is inviting owners of OPPO A53, OPPO A73, OPPO F17, and OPPO F19 to try out a beta build of ColorOS 12 based on Android 12
